data.message: Absolutely HATE the videos starting without my starting them!!!  I am on a laptop, not a mobile device, but it is still happening!!  This is AWFUL!!!  WHAT in the world are you all thinking???

replies.message: And now my laptop roars every time I am on FB; which makes it terrible to spend time on it.  What on earth makes you want to have your followers dislike you so much?  That we just want everyone to take the jump to something else at the same time?  And I only have FB open at the moment but my PC is running at like 50% CPU usage.  It is crazy.
